text: Neighborhood is a role-playing game published by Wheaton Publications in 1982. ==Description== Neighborhood is a childhood system (i.e., a game about being a kid). It consists of the every day struggles of children in suburban neighbourhoods. ==Publication history== Neighborhood was published by Wheaton Publications in 1982. ==Reception== ==References== Category:Comedy role- playing games Category:Role-playing games introduced in 1982
title: Neighborhood (role-playing game)
